title: Kevin Hart, Usher, Stay-cation Tips, Texas Mandates and more.
itunes:title: Kevin Hart, Usher, Stay-cation Tips, Texas Mandates and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Nothing messes up a weekend like a damn Monday. Fool #2 addresses egg in the eye, a bag of weed and being mediocre in Ask Bitterman. Rev. Adnoid is in for Pastor Motown and he talks about excommunication. Magic City in Vegas! What!!! J. Anthony Brown gives us some stay-cation tips. Gov. Abbot from Texas makes a controversial decision that compromises everyone's health. Jamaica showed pure dominance in Tokyo. The Fools give us ways to break away from short term cutty buddy arrangements. A UK woman with a healthy endowment just below the neck needs help. Today the show wrapped up with sharing a bucket of chicken!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
